attributes.action: To get Maurizio Sarri out of Chelsea Football Club. We want SARRI OUT
attributes.background: We as Chelsea fans and supporters are fed up with this man's lack of a brain when making footballing decisions. He plays the same team every week despite the level of the opposition. He continues to deny youngsters the chance of game time, such as Hudson-Odoi and Ampadu. His stubbornness is horrific
